comments:
Build 20030107

I click on External tools button (in tool bar) and select an existing task
(build.xml). The task is executed but I get log below.

Reason: this class is in an additonal library which is not declared as such in
the plugin.xml of org.eclipse.ui.externaltools

hosting...happens in the host>>

The class should not have been part of the antrunner.jar.
Fixed: moved the class, updated the jar and the plugin.xml.
Please verify (DarinW).
